issue.title: [Rust] [DataFusion] Create physical plan from logical plan
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6101](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6101). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Once the physical plan is in place and can be executed, I will implement logic to convert the logical plan to a physical plan and remove the legacy code for directly executing a logical plan.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6101?focusedCommentId=16927559) by Andy Grove (andygrove):*
Issue resolved by pull request 5111
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/5111>
